sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The ProFTPD package contains ftpcount, ftpshut, ftptop, ftpwho and proftpd.

sect3.title: ftpcount
sect3.para: ftpcount shows current number of connections.

sect3.title: ftpshut
sect3.para: ftpshut shuts down all proftpd servers at a given time.

sect3.title: ftptop
sect3.para: ftptop displays running status on connections.

sect3.title: ftpwho
sect3.para: ftpwho shows current process information for each session.
